name: Satvos Projektai
tagline: Team of professionals who love their job!
description: We at Satva Projects are a team of professionals who love what we do. Feeling the vibe of IT market we always strive to come up with best solutions for our customers. Treasuring our time – and yours – we get things done without delay. With us, you will feel constant, friendly and competent attention as we are always within reach and ready to help you out. Sattva in Sanskrit stands for enlightened, clear guidance /vision- that's what you can count on with us.
